item.title: Monday Nov 26 2012

3 Rounds
10 Squats
10 Sit ups
switch

3 Rounds
Farmers Carry 50/35 lbs DB’s
5 Squat Thrust Deadlift
Farmers Carry
switch

Row 100 Cals

3 Rounds
5 Burpees
7 Box Jumps
10 KB Swings 55/35
switch

item.title: St. Albert Food Bank
item.dc:creator: Suzanne Bougs
item.description: Helps us fill these big bad tires to the brim with food for the St. Albert Food Bank. We will collect from November 15 to December 15th.
item.content:encoded: Helps us fill these big bad tires to the brim with food for the St. Albert Food Bank.  We will collect from November 15 to December 15th.

item.title: Christmas Party! Friday, December 14th
item.dc:creator: Suzanne Bougs
item.description: All I want for Christmas is another Gymgerbread Gym… Aimee? Get your creative minds in motion because this year we want you all to show up in your best ugly sweater. Spouses and significant others – bring em if you’ve got em! Cost is $10 per person, appetizers provided. Please sign up and pay at [...]
item.content:encoded:
All I want for Christmas is another Gymgerbread Gym… Aimee?  Get your creative minds in motion because this year we want you all to show up in your best ugly sweater.  Spouses and significant others – bring em if you’ve got em!

Cost is $10 per person, appetizers provided.  Please sign up and pay at CrossFit Edmonton before November 23rd.

item.dc:creator: Auty

Rest 3 mins

Complete in as few sets as possible

75 KB swings 55/35

item.title: Fascial Stretch Therapy
item.dc:creator: Suzanne Bougs
item.description: Coach Yvo is offering Fascial Stretch Therapy on site. Some benefits to athletes include improved flexibility, increased speed, faster recovery and decrease in injuries. Check out Yvonne’s website for more details on the therapy or have a chat with her next time you are in.
item.content:encoded: Coach Yvo is offering Fascial Stretch Therapy on site.  Some benefits to athletes include improved flexibility, increased speed, faster recovery and decrease in injuries.  Check out Yvonne’s website for more details on the therapy or have a chat with her next time you are in.
